contentrichtext.text: '''Uninvited''' may refer to: ==Music== * [[Uninvited (song)|"Uninvited" (song)]], a song written, recorded and popularized by Alanis Morissette, later covered by Freemasons and Bailey Tzuke * [[The Uninvited (band)]], a band from Los Angeles ==Film== * [[The Uninvited (1944 film)|''The Uninvited'' (1944 film)]], a 1944 mystery/horror film based on the 1941 novel ''Uneasy Freehold'' by [[Dorothy Macardle]] * [[Uninvited (1988 film)|''The Uninvited'' (1988 film)]], a 1988 horror film * [[Uninvited (1993 film)|''Uninvited'' (1993 film)]], a 1993 film starring [[Jack Elam]] * [[Uninvited (1999 film)|''Uninvited'' (1999 film)]], directed by Carlo Gabriel Nero, starring Vanessa Redgrave * [[The Uninvited (2003 film)|''The Uninvited'' (2003 film)]], a 2003 South Korean psychological horror film also known as ''A Table for Four''. * [[The Uninvited (2008 film)|''The Uninvited'' (2008 film)]] * [[The Uninvited (2009 film)|''The Uninvited'' (2009 film)]], an American remake of the 2003 South Korean psychological horror film "[[A Tale of Two Sisters]]" ==Television== * ''The Uninvited'', a 1996 paranormal TV movie starring [[Beau Bridges]] and Sharon Lawrence * [[The Uninvited (TV series)|''The Uninvited'' (TV series)]], a 1997 ITV science fiction television series * [[Uninvited (Stargate SG-1)|"Uninvited" (''Stargate SG-1'')]], an episode of the science fiction television series ''Stargate SG-1'' * [[The Uninvited (Thunderbirds episode)|"The Uninvited" (''Thunderbirds'' episode)]], an episode of the Supermarionation television series ''Thunderbirds'' * [[The Uninvited (The Worst Witch)|"The Uninvited" (''The Worst Witch'')]], the final episode of ''The Worst Witch'' television series * "The Uninvited", an episode of the 2004 TV series ''[[Powers (UK TV series)#ep9|Powers]]'' ==Other fields== * [[Uninvited (game)|''Uninvited'' (video game)]], a haunted house "point and click" adventure game * [[The Uninvited (book)|''The Uninvited'' (book)]], a book about alien abductions written by [[Nick Pope]] ==See also== * [[Uninvited Guests]] {{disambig}}
